member.name: N:Microsoft.SqlServer.Dts.Tasks.WmiDataReaderTask
member.summary: The namespace contains the interfaces and classes used for the WMI Data Reader Task, which uses Windows Management Instrumentation (WMI) to return information about a computer system. For more information about the WMI Data Reader Task, see WMI Data Reader Task.

member.name: T:Microsoft.SqlServer.Dts.Tasks.WmiDataReaderTask.DestinationType
member.summary: Determines the type of destination specified in the property of a class.

member.name: F:Microsoft.SqlServer.Dts.Tasks.WmiDataReaderTask.DestinationType.FileConnection
member.summary: The property contains the name of a file connection that receives the results of the .

member.name: F:Microsoft.SqlServer.Dts.Tasks.WmiDataReaderTask.DestinationType.Variable
member.summary: The property contains the name of a String or Object variable that receives the results of the .

member.name: T:Microsoft.SqlServer.Dts.Tasks.WmiDataReaderTask.OutputType
member.summary: Determines the type of output returned by a class.

member.name: F:Microsoft.SqlServer.Dts.Tasks.WmiDataReaderTask.OutputType.DataTable
member.summary: Output is returned as a .

member.name: F:Microsoft.SqlServer.Dts.Tasks.WmiDataReaderTask.OutputType.PropertyNameAndValue
member.summary: Output is returned as a String that contains the name and value of a specified property.

member.name: F:Microsoft.SqlServer.Dts.Tasks.WmiDataReaderTask.OutputType.PropertyValue
member.summary: Output is returned as a String that contains the value of a specified property.

member.name: T:Microsoft.SqlServer.Dts.Tasks.WmiDataReaderTask.OverwriteDestination
member.summary: Determines how the class writes data to the destination specified in .

member.name: F:Microsoft.SqlServer.Dts.Tasks.WmiDataReaderTask.OverwriteDestination.AppendToDestination
member.summary: The task appends its results to existing data at the specified destination.

member.name: F:Microsoft.SqlServer.Dts.Tasks.WmiDataReaderTask.OverwriteDestination.KeepOriginal
member.summary: If data already exists at the specified destination, an error occurs.

member.name: F:Microsoft.SqlServer.Dts.Tasks.WmiDataReaderTask.OverwriteDestination.OverwriteDestination
member.summary: The task overwrites existing data at the specified destination.

member.name: T:Microsoft.SqlServer.Dts.Tasks.WmiDataReaderTask.QuerySourceType
member.summary: Determines the source type of , which provides the Windows Management Instrumentation Query Language (WQL) query to be executed by the class.

member.name: F:Microsoft.SqlServer.Dts.Tasks.WmiDataReaderTask.QuerySourceType.DirectInput
member.summary: contains the WQL query.

member.name: F:Microsoft.SqlServer.Dts.Tasks.WmiDataReaderTask.QuerySourceType.FileConnection
member.summary: contains the name of a file connection from which to retrieve the WQL query.

member.name: F:Microsoft.SqlServer.Dts.Tasks.WmiDataReaderTask.QuerySourceType.Variable
member.summary: contains the name of a variable from which to retrieve the WQL query.

member.name: T:Microsoft.SqlServer.Dts.Tasks.WmiDataReaderTask.WmiDataReaderTask
member.summary: Contains the members used to configure and run a WMI Data Reader task, which runs Windows Management Instrumentation (WMI) queries and returns WMI data about a computer system. This class cannot be inherited.

member.name: M:Microsoft.SqlServer.Dts.Tasks.WmiDataReaderTask.WmiDataReaderTask.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:Microsoft.SqlServer.Dts.Tasks.WmiDataReaderTask.WmiDataReaderTask.AcceptBreakpointManager(Microsoft.SqlServer.Dts.Runtime.BreakpointManager)
member.summary: Passes a reference to the task. This method is called by the runtime and is not used in code.

member.name: M:Microsoft.SqlServer.Dts.Tasks.WmiDataReaderTask.WmiDataReaderTask.Execute(Microsoft.SqlServer.Dts.Runtime.Connections,Microsoft.SqlServer.Dts.Runtime.VariableDispenser,Microsoft.SqlServer.Dts.Runtime.IDTSComponentEvents,Microsoft.SqlServer.Dts.Runtime.IDTSLogging,System.Object)
member.summary: Runs the task.
member.returns: A indicating the outcome of the execution.
member.param: A reference to an object that implements to raise events.
A reference to an object that implements .
The transaction object that the task is part of, depending on the value found in the TransactionOption property. This value can be set to a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic).

member.summary: Initializes the properties associated with the task. This method is called by the runtime and is not used in code.
member.param: An object that implements the interface for receiving events.
An object that implements the interface for logging events.

member.name: M:Microsoft.SqlServer.Dts.Tasks.WmiDataReaderTask.WmiDataReaderTask.ResumeExecution
member.summary: Resumes execution of the task after pausing. The task or container is resumed by the runtime engine.

member.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean that indicates if tasks should suspend when they encounter a breakpoint. This value is set by the runtime engine for tasks and containers when a breakpoint is encountered.
